Test OfflineAudioContext.startRendering Promise

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".


PASS Promise correctly rejected when calling startRendering twice
PASS context.state is "closed"
PASS renderedData.numberOfChannels is 2
PASS renderedData.length is 48000
PASS Rendered data matches expected results
PASS OfflineAudioContext.startRendering promise succeeded
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
